Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ActionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.ActionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionHandlerCLI, ActionHandlerGUI
    public abstract class ActionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewElement
    This is the interface that's dedicated to receiving all the possible actions available to current's turn user and displaying them to said user, so they could choose which one they want to go for. It also notifies the server with which action is selected by the user.

      • newCommand

        public final IEvent<ActionHandler,​Command<RemoteActionsHandler>> newCommand
        Event other classes can subscribe to. It is used to notify the subscribed classes of when a new command is chosen

        public final IEvent<ActionHandler,​RemoteAction> actionDoneEvent
        Event other classes can subscribe to. It is used to notify the subscribed classes of when the chosen action is completed

    • Method Detail

      • chooseAction

        public abstract void chooseAction​(java.util.List<RemoteAction> options)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Gets a list of possible actions and displays them to the user. Calls the other methods to make sure a notification is provided to the server once a choice has been taken by the user.
        Parameters:
        options - Is the list of actions available the user can choose from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - ClassNotFoundException

      • winnerMessage

        public abstract void winnerMessage​(java.lang.String winner)
        Method that describes what to do when the server notifies the client about the declaration of a winner. The exact protocol to follow depends on the interface chosen by the user
        Parameters:
        winner - Name of the winner of the match

      • reconnectedMessage

        public abstract void reconnectedMessage​(java.lang.String name)
        Method that describes what to do when the server notifies the client about the reconnection of a player. The exact protocol to follow depends on the interface chosen by the user
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the reconnected player

      • scoreboardMessage

        public abstract void scoreboardMessage​(java.lang.String[][] scoreboard)
        Method that describes what to do when the server sends the client the scoreboard relative to the match. The exact protocol to follow depends on the interface chosen by the user
        Parameters:
        scoreboard - Matrix of Strings that represents the scoreboard relative to the match this client is playing in

      • updateActionData

        public abstract void updateActionData​(RemoteAction.Data data)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onTurnStart

        public void onTurnStart()

      • notifyChoice

        protected void notifyChoice​(Command<RemoteActionsHandler> command)
